hjz_zork

Class Character

  • java.lang.Object
    • hjz_zork.Character
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Adventurer, PantSuitTroll, Troll

    abstract class Character
extends java.lang.Object
    Class which represents a character in the dungeon.
    Version:
    1.0, 11/09/2016
    Author:
    Hollis Pultz, John Pruchnic, Zachary Zwierko

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected boolean alive
      The life status of this Character.
      protected Room currentRoom
      This Character's current room in the dungeon.
      protected int damage
      The damage value this Character can inflict with fists (the default weapon).
      protected java.lang.String description
      The description of this Character.
      protected int health
      The health value of this Character (always starts at 100).
      protected java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,Item> inventory
      The items held by this Character.
      protected int lives
      The number of lives this Character has remaining including the current one.
      protected int load
      The weight of the inventory being carried by this Character.
      protected java.lang.String name
      The name of this Character.
      protected int score
      The score associated with this Character.
      protected int weight
      The weight of this Character.
